article.title: ARINC Supports U.S. Navy Unmanned Aircraft Systems
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Joint Precision Approach and Landing Systems

article.text: ARINC Engineering Services, LLC, Annapolis, Maryland, is being awarded a $9 million contract to procure technical and engineering services in support of the Joint Precision Approach and Landing Systems and Navy Unmanned Combat Aerial Systems programs. The U.S. Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
